content: In !4#5147 there were two deriving uses that I expected to work but apparently didn't. Do we know why? Either way, can we fix this easily? I'm happy to do it, I'm just not sure where to go looking.

Isn't that the delta deriving handler? Which is a long-standing to-do as it doesn't quite fit the deriving framework in lean 4 (see previous zulip messages for that keyword, I'm on mobile so can't link)

I think the relevant previous message is:
Mario Carneiro said:

Sebastian Ullrich said:

It would be nice to have a deriving handler for this

Actually, this came up in synport. Lean 3 has a deriving handler for this, the "delta derive handler", but lean 4 expects deriving handlers to be associated to a particular typeclass, and I don't see a space for fallback handlers
